Key Match Events: Qazim Laci scored in the 11th minute for Albania
Andrej Kramaric equalized about half an hour into the second half
An own goal by Klaus Gjasula made it 2-1 for Croatia just two minutes later
Gjasula redeemed himself by scoring Albania's equalizer in extra time
Post-Match Reflections: The result leaves both Croatia and Albania in a precarious situation in Group B after they lost to Spain and Italy, respectively, in their first matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first ever competitive match between Croatia and Albania
